themes: Need to center art in funding criteria
Concerns about fairness in grant allocation
Critique of nonprofits created solely for funding eligibility
Advocacy for grants proportional to organizational budgets
Systemic flaws in current funding processes
Reference to best practices in the arts sector
key_phrases: centering actual art in the questions and scoring
nonprofit created solely to qualify for a Thrive grant
deeply flawed system that must be completely overhauled
barriers_identified: Nonprofits created solely for funding eligibility receiving large grants
Established organizations with audiences receiving no funding
Current system not reflecting how the arts sector actually works
solutions_proposed: Center actual art in questions and scoring
Make grants proportional to organizational budgets
Completely overhaul the system according to best practices
